org.osate.ge.businessobjecthandling

Class ReferenceContext

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.osate.ge.businessobjecthandling.ReferenceContext

  • public class ReferenceContext
extends java.lang.Object
    Contains contextual information for getting the reference to a business object.
    Since:
    2.0
    No Extend:
    This class is not intended to be subclassed by clients.

    • Constructor Summary

      Creates a new instance.

      Retrieves the business object for which a reference is being requested.
      <T> java.util.Optional<T> getBusinessObject(java.lang.Class<T> boType)
      Retrieves the business object for which a reference is being requested if the business object is an instance of the specified class.
      ReferenceBuilderService getReferenceBuilder()
      Returns a reference to the reference builder service.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ReferenceContext

        public ReferenceContext(java.lang.Object bo,
                        ReferenceBuilderService referenceBuilder)
        Creates a new instance.
        Parameters:
        bo - is the business object for which to retrieve a reference.
        referenceBuilder - is a reference to the reference builder service.
        No Reference:
        This constructor is not intended to be referenced by clients.

    • Method Detail

      • getBusinessObject

        public java.lang.Object getBusinessObject()
        Retrieves the business object for which a reference is being requested.
        Returns:
        the business object for which a reference is being requested.
        Since:
        2.0

      • getBusinessObject

        public <T> java.util.Optional<T> getBusinessObject(java.lang.Class<T> boType)
        Retrieves the business object for which a reference is being requested if the business object is an instance of the specified class.
        Type Parameters:
        T - is the requested type.
        Parameters:
        boType - is the class to which to cast the business object.
        Returns:
        an optional containing the context's business object. An empty optional if the context's business object is not an instance the specified class.
        Since:
        2.0

      • getReferenceBuilder

        public ReferenceBuilderService getReferenceBuilder()
        Returns a reference to the reference builder service.
        Returns:
        a reference to the reference builder service
